rules.natural: Whenever the water source is accessible, then under the condition that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.
If the water source is purifiable, then, in the event that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.
Under the condition that the sampling task is completed, the water source is accessible or the water source is purifiable.
Whenever the sampling task is rescheduled, it is not the case that the sampling task is canceled.
Provided that the GPS device is activated, then the GPS device is connected to the network.
The GPS device is activated or the GPS device is charged.
If the GPS device is charged, then, under the condition that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.
Whenever the GPS device is connected to the network, the GPS device has a signal with the satellite.
Provided that the water filter has a filter cartridge, then if the water filter is functional, the water filter provides clean water to the team.
If the backpack has a replacement cartridge, then, whenever the water filter is functional, the water filter provides clean water to the team.

If it is not the case that whenever the field researcher is assigned to the river site, then, under the condition that the water filter does not have a filter cartridge or the backpack does not have a replacement cartridge, the water filter needs maintenance, then the field researcher is reassigned to the forest site.
In the event that it is not true that if the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed, the sampling task is canceled.
If it is not the case that whenever it is not true that if the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed, the sampling task is rescheduled, then the project is abandoned.
If the base camp does not have generator power, then the water filter is functional.

facts.natural: The field researcher is assigned to the river site.
It is not the case that the GPS device has power for the field researcher.
The water filter does not need maintenance.
The field researcher is not reassigned to the forest site.
The GPS device does not have a signal with the satellite.
The water filter does not provide clean water to the team.

target.natural: The base camp has generator power.

steps.natural: If the GPS device is activated, then the GPS device has a signal with the satellite.
Either the GPS device has a signal with the satellite or, if the base camp does not have generator power, then the GPS device has power for the field researcher.
Under the condition that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.
The base camp has generator power.

If the field researcher is assigned to the river site, then, provided that the water filter does not have a filter cartridge or the backpack does not have a replacement cartridge, the water filter needs maintenance.
If the water filter does not have a filter cartridge or the backpack does not have a replacement cartridge, the water filter needs maintenance.
The water filter has a filter cartridge or the backpack has a replacement cartridge.
If the water filter is functional, then it provides clean water to the team.
The water filter is not functional.
The base camp has generator power.
Provided that it is not the case that if the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed, the sampling task is rescheduled.
If it is not true that whenever the sampling task is scheduled, the sampling task is completed, then it is not the case that the sampling task is canceled.
If the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed.
Provided that the sampling task is scheduled, it follows that the water source is accessible or the water source is purifiable.
Either the water source is accessible or the water source is purifiable.
Under the condition that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.
The base camp has generator power.

(A11 → (¬(A8 ∨ A9) → A10)).natural: If the field researcher is assigned to the river site, then, provided that the water filter does not have a filter cartridge or the backpack does not have a replacement cartridge, the water filter needs maintenance.

(A13 → (¬G → A1)).natural: Whenever the water source is accessible, then under the condition that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either the water source is accessible or the water source is purifiable.

(A14 → (¬G → A1)).natural: If the water source is purifiable, then, in the event that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.

(A15 → (A13 ∨ A14)).natural: Provided that the sampling task is scheduled, it follows that the water source is accessible or the water source is purifiable.

(A15 → A16).natural: If the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed.

(A16 → (A13 ∨ A14)).natural: Under the condition that the sampling task is completed, the water source is accessible or the water source is purifiable.

(A18 → ¬A17).natural: Whenever the sampling task is rescheduled, it is not the case that the sampling task is canceled.

(A2 ∨ (¬G → A1)).natural: Either the GPS device has a signal with the satellite or, if the base camp does not have generator power, then the GPS device has power for the field researcher.

(A3 → A2).natural: If the GPS device is activated, then the GPS device has a signal with the satellite.

(A3 → A5).natural: Provided that the GPS device is activated, then the GPS device is connected to the network.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: The GPS device is activated or the GPS device is charged.

(A4 → (¬G → A1)).natural: If the GPS device is charged, then, under the condition that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.

(A5 → A2).natural: Whenever the GPS device is connected to the network, the GPS device has a signal with the satellite.

(A6 → A7).natural: If the water filter is functional, then it provides clean water to the team.

(A8 → (A6 → A7)).natural: Provided that the water filter has a filter cartridge, then if the water filter is functional, the water filter provides clean water to the team.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: The water filter has a filter cartridge or the backpack has a replacement cartridge.

(A9 → (A6 → A7)).natural: If the backpack has a replacement cartridge, then, whenever the water filter is functional, the water filter provides clean water to the team.

(¬(A11 → (¬(A8 ∨ A9) → A10)) → A12).natural: If it is not the case that whenever the field researcher is assigned to the river site, then, under the condition that the water filter does not have a filter cartridge or the backpack does not have a replacement cartridge, the water filter needs maintenance, then the field researcher is reassigned to the forest site.

(¬(A15 → A16) → A17).natural: In the event that it is not true that if the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed, the sampling task is canceled.

(¬(A15 → A16) → A18).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed, the sampling task is rescheduled.

(¬(A15 → A16) → ¬A17).natural: If it is not true that whenever the sampling task is scheduled, the sampling task is completed, then it is not the case that the sampling task is canceled.

(¬(A8 ∨ A9) → A10).natural: If the water filter does not have a filter cartridge or the backpack does not have a replacement cartridge, the water filter needs maintenance.

(¬(¬(A15 → A16) → A18) → A19).natural: If it is not the case that whenever it is not true that if the sampling task is scheduled, then the sampling task is completed, the sampling task is rescheduled, then the project is abandoned.

(¬G → A1).natural: Under the condition that the base camp does not have generator power, the GPS device has power for the field researcher.

(¬G → A6).natural: If the base camp does not have generator power, then the water filter is functional.
